title: calendarType
description:
Determines how an event is planned based on 1 of 4 possible types.

- `single`: The event happens once (on one day or spanning multiple days)
- `multiple`: The event happens multiple times, on _specific_ dates
- `periodic`: The event spans a longer period of time, optionally with a recurring weekscheme (as defined in `openingHours`)
- `permanent`: The event has no planned end date, optionally with a recurring weekscheme (as defined in `openingHours`). *Not recommended for events, consider creating a place instead*
